document_data.caption: A clerk at the Jamm Services office at the port of [[Hisssta]].
document_data.name: Jamm Services
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamm Services''' was a company on the planet [[Coliar]] that provided information and services to visiting [[spelljammer]]s.
document_data.Organization: Since some time before [[1350 DR]], the director of Jamm Services was a rude and arrogant lizardman named [[Schlith Darkscale]].
document_data.Base of Operations: It is not known how many office locations there were for Jamm Services nor where its headquarters was located, but at least one office was found on the major port island of [[Hisssta]].
document_data.Activities: Jamm Services provided information about restaurants, taverns, adventure sites, and other notable locations.
